main_text: While we encourage you to consider donating to the club to support the hobby of ham radio, it is not necessary in order to receive club updates. Sign up at Ham Club Online and request non-membership access to the WY7H club to receive occasional updates and newsletters about events, planned meetings, and more! Already a club member? Great! No additional steps are necessary in order to receive club newsletters. We don't sell our email lists, and we don't spam our members. Promise!
